́%ls of my brothers still remain, held captive in those stealth boxes. Please, save them!
ā
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_503: ́Once you release them, let them know to come meet me back here at Wood Park.
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_501:
́Being stuck in that box in the Grim Tundra was the
worst... it was so cold and lonely!
ā
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_601:
́I have a feeling that one of my brothers is held captive
on the outskirts of the Grim Tundra.
ā
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_602:
́%ls of my brothers still remain, held captive in those stealth boxes. Please, save them!
ā
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_701:
́I have a feeling that one of my brothers is held captive
just outside of the Darkiron Bastille.
ā
DEMO_048_MSG_002:
́Now, to reach that despicable Fortress, you'll just need to head a ways to the southeast of here!
ā
Once you see the stone arch, you can simply follow the road right beneath it all the way to Glutton's Keep.
ā
One more thing before you leave us... Her Highness here has something 
she would like to bestow upon you to assist you!
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_702:
́%ls of my brothers still remain, held captive in those stealth boxes. Please, save them!
ā
DEMO_048_MSG_003:
̂I'm beggin' you dearie... take super good care of my darling honeybunch, and get everyone back here safe.. you included, hun!
ā
Equip this ring by slippin' it on one o' your monsters!
It'll make 'em even stronger!
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_703: ́Once you release them, let them know to come meet me back here at Wood Park.
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_802:
́%ls of my brothers still remain, held captive
in those stealth boxes. Please, save them!
ā
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_803: ́Once you release them, let them know to come meet me back here at Wood Park.
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_902:
́If you are able to reunite all of my brothers... I'm planning on showing you something special.
ā
COLORFONDUE_WHITE_903:
́Until then, just keep telling my other brothers that you
find along the way to make their way back here to me.
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_001:
́It's possible to gain even more colors by mixing together the different colors we offer to make new ones.
ā
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_002:
́Mixing a Red and Blue Fondue, for instance, will result
in a Purple Fondue...
ā
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_003:
́You'll just have to try our various color combinations.
I'm sure you'll find it to be quite fun.
REC_POINT_GR_03_02: ̄A personal computing device made by combining mechanical components collected from a junkyard.
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_004:
́Enough of 'zat, 'zo... Sir ȁ, have you come
across any %lss on your travels?
ā
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_201:
́Excusez-moi? You must be mistaken, mon ami.
ā
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_202: ́Remember, I'm looking for ' ze%lss, at least %ls or more of 'zem, alright?
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_301:
́Je vois... I must admit, I'm disappointed. If you change your mind 'zough, 
just let me know.
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_401:
́Incroyable, Sir ȁ! All of my brothers are back, and 'zey
'ave you to thank for it!
ā
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_402: ́Go speak with Brother White! I know he's got something he's been waiting to show you.
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_501:
́Merci beaucoup! It is my savior, Sir ȁ! 
I vanted to give you a proper salute!
ā
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_502:
́I had just started to lose all of 'ze remaining hope I had,
stuck inside of 'zat box...
ā
COLORFONDUE_GREEN_503:
́It is a scary thought, no? What would have become of me,
had you not saved me, Sir ȁ?!
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_001:
́Monsters that have already been recolored can also
be restored to their original color palette.
ā
REC_POINT_GR_06_02: ̄A mysterious box left behind in Wood Park. When you listen closely to it, you can hear a loud noise.
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_002:
́You can even regain a Rainbow Fondude, that was
expended to make its color, upon reverting.
ā
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_003:
́If they were mixed, though, it might be one of
the Rainbow Fondude's parent colors.
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_004:
́By the way, before I forget... I recently started my own item business.
ā
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_005: ́If you've got time, how about taking a look at my wares?Ă
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_101: ́I hope you found what you needed! Come back anytime!
COLORFONDUE_RED_002:
́Slimes, for instance, can only have their body
recolored, as they have no other body parts...
ā
COLORFONDUE_RED_202: ́When you have %ls(%ls or more), please come speak with me again.
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_402: ́Go see my eldest brother, Brother White. He'll have all the details for you.
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_501:
́Hey! My god, I thought I'd never get out of that stealth box...
ā
COLORFONDUE_RED_402: ́It's great to be reunited with my brothers. You'll find us all over at Brother White's place!
COLORFONDUE_BLACK_502: ́I thought I was next in line to join the undead souls up there on the Spirit Road! Hah hah hah!
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_001:
́I'm a member of the endangered tribe of Fondue
monsters from within the Broken World.
ā
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_002:
́If you wouldn't mind looking for the other members of
my family, you'd best seek out rips in space and time.
ā
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_003:
́Some of the others... I heard may have gone to serve
someone who is really into collecting Tiny Medals...
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_004:
́Ah, yes! Before I forget... I've been collecting lots of %lss...
ā
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_005: {noise_speak_01「ȁ, could we exchange my teasure for %ls of your %ls? Ģ
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_402:
́We've got to hurry over to Brother White's place!
I can't wait to see what awaits us over there.
COLORFONDUE_BLUE_502:
́Thanks to you though, I got out of there and I'm
home where I belong.
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_001:
́ȁ, there are certain parts of a monster that cannot be recolored...
ā
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_002:
́Typically, demons with black, white or gray parts
are harder to recolor.
ā
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_003: ́Metal Slimes and Stone Golems, for instance, are not suitable candidates for recoloring.
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_004:
́That said, ȁ... I've been collecting a lot of %lss lately...
ā
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_005: ́If you have them, could we exchange my treasure for %ls of your %ls? ģ
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_102: ́Oh hoh hoh... thank you very much. Come back when you find some more, alright?
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_202: ́Remember, I'm looking for %ls... more specifically, %ls of them.
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_301:
́That's so disappointing to hear. But, if you change
your mind, simply let me know.
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_401:
́Thanks to you, ȁ, my brothers and
I have finally been reunited.
ā
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_402: ́We'd all like to thank you, but first... perhaps you could just go speak with Brother White?
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_501:
́I could never find a way to break out of the Darkiron Bastille while I was trapped in there.
ā
COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_502:
́Thanks to you, though, ȁ, I'm free
once more... it's good to be out, oh hoh hoh!
COLORFONDUE_RED_001:
́The parts of a monster that can be recolored are
different for each type.
ā
COLORFONDUE_RED_003:
́While monsters, like Boss Trolls, can recolor their
skin, clothes, and other parts.
COLORFONDUE_RED_004:
́By the way... I have a small favor to ask of you. I've been seeking out %lss...
ā
COLORFONDUE_RED_005: ́If you have them, could we exchange my treasure for %ls of your %ls? ģ
COLORFONDUE_RED_102:
́Thank you so much! Bring me more whenever you
can find it!
COLORFONDUE_RED_201:
́Hmm... it doesn't appear that you have enough.
ā
COLORFONDUE_RED_301: ́Well... I'm not sure what to say to that. Let me know if you change your mind.
COLORFONDUE_RED_401:
́This is great! Finally, all six of the Fondudes have made it back to Wood Park!
ā
COLORFONDUE_RED_501:
́Hoo-boy... talk about a heated situation. Being trapped
inside that box inside the Fiery Volcano...
ā
COLORFONDUE_RED_502:
́Had you arrived any later and not saved me, I'd
have baked inside of that damned box!
RUKIYA_MSG:
̃Will you take me with you to Ground Zero, ȁ? It's just north of the Core...
ā
Hey, I'm asking nicely... I'd do it myself, but you can only get there via Sky Ridable monsters.
NPC_KING_REC: ̄The King of the Nochoro species. Due to his oversized body, he cannot move without the assistance of his subordinates.
NPC_QUEEN_REC: ̄The wife of the Nochoro King. She absolutely loves gaudy jewelry.
NPC_JACK_REC: ̄Servant to the Nochoro King. Manages the King's subjects as well.
NPC_RUKIYA_REC:
̄An elderly woman who once led the Resistance.
Still a very intelligent woman, and an active leader to this day.
NPC_MASTER_NOCHO_REC: ̄A Nochoro seeking the ultimate program. It also has quite the adventurous attitude.
NPC_NOCHO_MEN_REC: ̄A male of the Nochoro species. They are quite curious and friendly in nature.
NPC_NOCHO_WOMEN_REC: ̄A female of the Nochoro species. They are shy and quite cautious.
NPC_COLORFONDUE_BLACK_REC: ̄A black Rainbow Fondude, and one of the fondue brothers. It's the color of a thick, dark, foggy night.
NPC_COLORFONDUE_BLUE_REC: ̄A blue Rainbow Fondude, like the color of the sky.
NPC_COLORFONDUE_YELLOW_REC: ̄A yellow Rainbow Fondude. Kind of like a bitter, yet refreshing lemon.
REC_POINT_GR_02_02: ̄Space-travel device leading Monster Masters to the Virtual Colosseum.
REC_POINT_GR_04_02: ̄A fountain sprung from the gap between the roots and created this small spring. The Nochoro use this for their drinking water.
REC_POINT_GR_05_02: ̄A mysterious box left behind in Wood Park. When you listen closely to it, you can hear a loud noise.
DEMO_048_MSG_001: ́Splendid! It looks like Ace came through for you after all, Master ȁ!
